Commands.defaultOutput:
This is the load commmand
This is used for loading previously saved files.

This is the connect commmand
This can be used to connect to any ip address in your connections list.

This is the ipinfo commmand
This can be used to add any ip address to your local database.

This is the dir commmand
This can be used to list files in the current directory.

This is the log commmand
This can be used to view the logs of the computer you are connected to.
